damages.description: Small white scratch near the lower-left edge of the front bumper.
Faint scratch marks and paint chips near the center bottom of the front bumper.
Multiple small scratches and paint chips on the lower-right edge of the front bumper.
Faint vertical scratch above the lower-right bumper scratches.

text_summary: The vehicle's front bumper exhibits several minor scratches and paint chips, primarily along the lower-left, lower-center, and lower-right edges. No dents or rust are visible, and the overall condition of the front exterior is fair, with only superficial cosmetic damage.
